sen.e: At first, Daigaku-ryo mainly taught Confucianism, the study referred to as "Myogyo-do" (the study of Confucian classics) in later years, but after two educational system reforms in 728 and 730--Through the former, "Monjo hakase" (a professor of literature) and "Ritsugaku hakase" (a professor of the law in the Ritsuryo system), which was referred to as "Myobo hakase"(professor of law) in later years, were introduced.
